page.title: 12Health in South Bradford.
page.content: It is a fact that more and more people are living to a ripe old age and South Bradford has one of the highest percentages of old people in the City. {14.2%}of the population is{over 65}and {5.5%}are{over 75.}In East and West Bowling there are more old people living in institutions than in any other part of the Metropolitan area. AGES 65-74 75-84 Over 85 PATIENTS 54 111 88 These figures explain the high number of Nursing or Old People's Homes in the 'block', one of which is Birchlands. This centre has facilities for 40 patients most of which live in single rooms. These patients are incapable of looking after themselves unlike those whose visit the{Day {Centre.}This facility is available from 10 a.m. to 4 p.m. and the patients are brought in by bus.
